website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for those who want a strong hair spray that won't dull their color-treated hair.
pros: Easily washes out and won't build up in your hair

customer_reviews.title: Beware!  I Must Have Received a Counterfeit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a can at my beauty salon, and when I saw this on Amazon for $7 less, I ordered it. When it came, I thought to myself that the printing on the can was not totally identical to the first one I had purchased, but kept it. A few weeks later, I tried it - it didn't smell or feel the same. On my 3rd use, the sprayer button broke! What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Teachergal

customer_reviews.title: ... that the spray nozzel is broken which renders it useless. I have ordered this many times and never ...
customer_reviews.text: I just tried to use this spray today as my other just ran out and have discovered that the spray nozzel is broken which renders it useless. I have ordered this many times and never had a problem joping this company makes it right as this is not a cheap product. Update: Amazon immediately offered to replace the spray, very satisfied. I do like the spray and have used it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SGELET

customer_reviews.title: I have fine hair and every other hairspray weighs it down
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and every other hairspray weighs it down. This has been perfect for my fine hair and also adds volume!
customer_reviews.author: Laura George

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I have crazy hair that deserves its own zip code. This hairspray was okay, but didn't stand up too long for me. By two hours, my hair was all over the place. My girlfriend really likes it and had recommended it to me. I ended up giving it to her.
customer_reviews.author: skm526

customer_reviews.title: Perfect styling aid
customer_reviews.text: I never use hairspray. I don't consider this hairspray I just consider it a a perfect styling aid that lets you manage your hair perfectly without any heaviness. It has none of the bad characteristics of hairspray i.e. crunchiness, stickiness and glue like consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lueders

customer_reviews.title: Best hairspray for babyfine flyaway hair!
customer_reviews.text: Best hairspray for my babyfine flyaway hair! It tames the flyaway hair with a flexible hold and my hair doesn't looks full of hairspray. I will honestly never use another hairspray again and this is a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you have thin fine hair your going to love this!
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray has a very light spray great for fixing fine thin hair then you can use a heavier hold after. I absolutely love this hairspray will be ordering again. I have been looking for a hairspray that sprays like this for years. Anyone with fine thin hair knows what I'm talking about you can style your hair spray it with a forceful spray and your style looks completely different! You won't deal with that with this spray.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I find the smell really awful and can't get past ...
customer_reviews.text: I find the smell really awful and can't get past it to even rate the other attributes. Sorry, but, no!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Best hair products
customer_reviews.text: Strengthens hair, moisture’s hair does all kinds of good things for your hair really good for hi lots. Wouldn’ t use anything else on my hair!!! Shelia W
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Great hairspray product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Hairspray and have used it for years. Don't expect it when using prime. It comes from purelology and takes at least 2 weeks. Good price
customer_reviews.author: P Anne Steele

customer_reviews.title: Smells simply awful
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews about the scent and thought, "How bad can it possibly be?" Well, please do not buy this product if you are at all sensitive to smells. I have no idea what creates the scent, but it lingers and it just awful. It's isn't floral, it isn't herbal --it is hard to describe. And if you are a fan of the Incharge Plus hairspray, this isn't even in the same ballpark as far as the hold. I wish they would bring the old product back.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar H.

customer_reviews.title: Just the Spray was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This spray is very light (not sticky) like many others, but still provides the control you need. It came highly recommended by my stylist and shipped in 3 days!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement to my normal hair spray, but wasn't thrilled with this one. I have fine hair that needs some extra assistance for volume. This didn't have enough hold for me.
customer_reviews.author: G Mom

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to look at the size before ordering and I paid the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair spray. It holds the hair in place without getting the "crunching" feel. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Holds well
customer_reviews.text: This product holds well and does not seem sticky. Great stuff. This product is not like all the hair sprays on the shelves of the stores. I believe all pureology products are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lueck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It a product that my wife uses and she's happy and that's all that matters!
customer_reviews.author: John Molt

customer_reviews.title: Pureology hairspray
customer_reviews.text: This hairspray has a nice smell to it and doesn't go on too heavy. As long as you spray it far away from your head, it won't leave white residue like many hairsprays when it dries.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: It holds good but doesn't make your hair sticky
customer_reviews.text: I have used this hairspray since it was available for purchase. It holds good but doesn't make your hair sticky. Great hairspray!
customer_reviews.author: TBadgett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have used for a few years and it is the best hair spray I have ever used. It does not pile up or make you hair stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Same as all the others!
customer_reviews.text: It's no different than any other hairspray product....although it doesn't have a very pleasant smell. Someone told me this spray was good for your hair, but I don't know about that.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian P.

customer_reviews.title: Would order again
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product once I got it. I typically buy this in a salon so I know I received the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this hairspray. Leaves hair with a soft feel, but a strong hold
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scent is a little strong and offers immediate hold but doesn't last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray. It works with however you style your hair. I've been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: love this hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a number of years..it leaves my hair soft with just the right amount of control..I have fine straight hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ever spray for a light hold. Not sticky at all. Worth the $$....
customer_reviews.author: S. Chance

customer_reviews.title: Provides good hold without my hair being stiff or sticky
customer_reviews.text: Provides good hold without my hair being stiff or sticky. It also provides shine and it has a good fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the travel size...!! Works great for light hold and leaves no residue in your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a very long time and love the way it goes on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Lally

customer_reviews.title: I will not buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the produce I ordered. What I got was a knock off, and the top was broken. Life and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Hold, no helmet head
customer_reviews.text: This provides great HOLD without gluing my hair down. It still shines and flows.
customer_reviews.author: NVSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Purology Hair Spray
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product. It does not create build up on my hair. It is easily washed out. My hair is manageable, yet the product does an excellent job at maintaining the style. I will definitely continue using this hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: busynurse

customer_reviews.title: Pureology products the best
customer_reviews.text: No other brand of hair products work on my hair like all the Pureology products have worked. None other for me!
customer_reviews.author: OrphanAnnie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Holds without being sticky. Nice fragrance, which is really important to me. Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a very long time and is thrilled to be able to pay less on amazon. com
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Lally

customer_reviews.title: Great hair spray
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years and I love it..Has a medium firm hold and it smell good
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairspray Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Pureology products. This hairspray gives great control without being sticky. It has a very nice scent. Best hairspray ever!
customer_reviews.author: Denise G

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hairspray. Keeps my hair soft yet in place. And it doesn't fade my hair color! Lasts forever as well! Will keep buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: karenL

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Great spray---holds well and doesn't "gunk" your hair all up with residue. It may be a little more pricy than other brands but it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got is for mom she loved it ,,I will keep ording this product ,,👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Castro Valley(henry) Ca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It was wrapped in so much tape I couldn't get the tape off!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: Hairspray was really really old and my Grandaughter was by me when I sprayed the first spray on my hair and she said"What is that bad smell Oma? I said bad old hair spray. The same thing they wanted me to send this back and they new they have to know that their buying old product. What a shame it was a lot when you add the two together 40 some dollars I could not afford they are in the garbadge.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: SHAME ON PUREOLOGY
customer_reviews.text: Shame on you Pureology! This is the worst hairspray I have ever used. The smell is horrible... not a perfume... just something gone bad. Not only did this spray not hold my hairstyle, within an hour, the curl was flat! Later, I could not comb it through without breakage. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. ( I use other Pureology products with good results. This one is a miss.)
customer_reviews.author: Lydia S.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair soft, but doesn't help with humidity or wind.
customer_reviews.text: I know it is just a strengthening control spray, but I was hoping it would hold my hair style in the humidity and also a little in the wind. After all I live in Kansas.. It is a very easy to use hair spray and I don't know about the strengthening yet, but hope it helps with split ends from the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Noble

customer_reviews.title: Great Hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I have used Pureology shampoo and conditioner and really like the product. Had not tried the hairspray before, but found it to be gentle, yet firm on fine hair. I really like it and plan to continue to use it. It is not sticky, either.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like but the nozzle keeps falling off - so the design is poor
customer_reviews.author: jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, although it arrived a bit banged up.
customer_reviews.author: M Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: I like that I can use it before I use my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can use it before I use my flat iron and after I style my hair. It holds my hair in place all day without looking stiff!
customer_reviews.author: Melanee Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great hairspray
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and its not to sticky you can put your fingers through your hair yet it holds your hair
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Never stiff or sticky it is a great product I have been using for nine months and I love it
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Has great light hold and a great smell. My hair actually moves with this spray. I also get many compliments on the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Blu-ray lover

customer_reviews.title: I have short fine hair that is hard to control
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave the house without using this spray. I have short fine hair that is hard to control. This product gives control without turning my head into a helmut.
customer_reviews.author: Diane  L.

customer_reviews.title: Stinky!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Pureology products for more than eight years and swear by them! However, I do not like this product - it smells bad and the stench lingers for several hours after using the product.
customer_reviews.author: JJ79

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LOVE THIS HAIRSPRAY. IF YOU WANT LIGHT FEEL, ADD BODY, GREAT SMELLING AND VERY MANAGABILITY THIS IS IT. I PROMISE. LOVE IT !!! ALSO I HAVE LIGHT HAIR AND IT DOES NOT DULL AT ALL!! I JUST ORDERED THE LARGER SIZE. NOW I CAN CLEAN OUT MY BATHROOM CABINET OF THE OTHERS I WAS SO DISAPPOINTED WITH !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Pureology Colour Stylist Strengthening Control Zero Dulling Hairspray
product_meta.description:
Size:11 Fl Oz

BENEFITS
Best hairspray for color protection with a shiny, flexible finish 

KEY TECHNOLOGIES
Protects hair color while strengthening strands

INGREDIENTS
ALCOHOL DENAT., HYDROFLUOROCARBON 152A, VA/CROTONATES/VINYL NEODECANOATE COPOLYMER, AMINOMETHYL PROPANOL, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ASCORBYL PALMITATE,
ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, EUGENOL, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS PEEL OIL / ORANGE PEEL OIL, BENZYL BENZOATE, BHT





BRAND STORY
Pureology offers a collection of haircare & styling products that enhance & protect color vibrancy. From concentrated Zero Sulfate Shampoos to our conditioners & stylers, each product is designed to maximize color retention.
